title: List Artifacts Response
description: List of artifacts for a given `taskId` and `runId`.

artifacts.title: Artifact List
artifacts.description: List of artifacts for given `taskId` and `runId`.

items.title: Artifact
items.description: Information about an artifact for the given `taskId` and `runId`.

storageType.title: Artifact Storage-Type
storageType.description:
This is the `storageType` for the request that was used to create
the artifact.

name.title: Artifact Name
name.description:
Name of the artifact that was created, this is useful if you want to
attempt to fetch the artifact.

expires.title: Artifact Expiration
expires.description:
Date and time after which the artifact created will be automatically
deleted by the queue.

contentType.title: Content-Type
contentType.description: Mimetype for the artifact that was created.

continuationToken.title: Continuation Token
continuationToken.description:
Opaque `continuationToken` to be given as query-string option to get the
next set of artifacts.
This property is only present if another request is necessary to fetch all
results. In practice the next request with a `continuationToken` may not
return additional results, but it can. Thus, you can only be sure to have
all the results if you've called with `continuationToken` until you get a
result without a `continuationToken`.
